summary:
I didn\'t like how slow the animals were in skyrim, so I changed it to be more realistic.
One used to be able to punch a deer to death, and even run faster than it >_>
descriptionHtml:
Updated:
The mod now speeds up most animals in the game:
Foxes
Rabbits
Wolves
Deer
Elk
Sabre Cats
Skeevers

please let me know if you see any of these animals not running fast enough or something. I may have missed something.

Should make hunting a bit more of a challenge.

Next steps will be to make the animals turn faster so they don\'t just sit there and look at you as they slowly turn a little bit. Goal is to make most animals turn pretty instantly.

I hope to get into modding this game more often this summer, but for now, a simple fix.

I recommend that you also install the SkyTEST mod (I use it with this and it seems to be compatible :)  )


Post in the comments section and I\'ll probably answer you. I don\'t mind spending any amount of time going through comments.
author: Nyxeka
